addr: 3751 South Harvard Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90018
title: Hour Of Code Tech Fair
desc: Foshay Tech Academy, in Partnership with Code.org  Invites Community to Hour of Code Tech Fair  Computer Science Education Week starts December 7th and the  Foshay Tech Academy  in South Los Angeles is hosting an Hour of Code event to inspire and engage the community. The Hour of Code is a global movement reaching tens of millions of students in 180+ countries. The Tech Academy believes that students should learn computer science as it helps students to develop 21st century skills to prepare them for college and careers. This event highlights the innovative work that is happening at the Foshay Tech Academy as a way of showing what is possible and needed in schools throughout the Los Angeles area. WHO:? Students and teachers from the Foshay Tech Academy in collaboration with Code.org; leaders from LAUSD, UCLA and industry will also be in attendance. WHERE :  Foshay Learning Center , 3751 S. Harvard Blvd, Los Angeles, 90018 WHEN:  Monday, December 7th from ?10am - 12pm.  RSVP HERE 10am - 11am  - Tech Fair - guests are invited to interact with students and their projects  11:00 - 11:30  -- Presentation and comments from community leaders 11:30 - noon  -- Reception
